sourcesContent:
export const About = () => { return

About This App

This is an attendance application that will record class attendance for Educators to keep record of class.

How to use it:

You must register your account in order to record attendance.

After registration and login, click the button to create a class you will teach along with students that will be assigned to the class.

Once you create a class, it is all set. If there are changes, do not worry there will buttons available to make necessary changes on your roster.

};
